title: Sona Passive
body:
There should be an indication for which bonus Sona's next auto-attack will have from her passive "Power chord". Whether it's a change of colour to the passive icon, (i.e Blue for q bonus, green for w and purple for e.)
Or my preferred idea; the icon of the ability (q,w,e) should appear above the icon of her passive to indicate which bonus shell get for her next aa. {{champion:37}}

replies.body: There are colours for the power cords, Blue Q, Green W, Purple E and they show when they are ready and it depends on your last used ability. There is a visual effect when it's ready you just have to look at her?

And what a great indicator, there is no way that that is efficient enough. In team fights you wont be looking at the colourfull swirls around your champ, there should be an indication on her ui, something more noticeable.
And also for someone who is colour blind its not very helpfull (the purple and the blue look legit the same.)
